sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词均有"死，死亡"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: die, decease, expire, perish, pass away
means: die ： 最普通用词，指某人或某物失去生命而永远不存在。
decease ： 正式用词，多指法律上的用语。
expire ： 委婉用词。从本义"从肺部吐出气来"引申为吐出最后一口气，断气而死。
perish ： 书面用词，多指夭折或不幸暴亡。

sentence.Network_en: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish.
sentence.Network_cn: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

sentence.Network_en: Me a policeman! Perish the thought!
sentence.Network_cn: 我当警察！想都别想了，不可能！

jx.jx_en_mean: Used to express the wish that one not even think about something.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 表达一种甚至从未想过的愿望

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French periss-, lengthened stem of perir, from Latin perire 'pass away', from per- 'through, completely' + ire 'go'

entry.def: If people or animals perish, they die as a result of very harsh conditions or as the result of an accident.

example.ex: Most of the butterflies perish in the first frosts of autumn.
example.tran: 大多数蝴蝶会在秋天的第一场霜冻来临时纷纷死去。

example.ex: ...the ferry disaster in which 193 passengers perished.
example.tran: 造成193名乘客丧生的渡船事故

entry.def: If something perishes, it comes to an end or is destroyed for ever.

example.ex: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish...
example.tran: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

example.ex: Civilizations do eventually decline and perish.
example.tran: 各种文明最后都会衰落、消亡。

entry.def: If a substance or material perishes, it starts to fall to pieces and becomes useless.

example.ex: Obviously the plaster's just perished and all fallen off...
example.tran: 很明显灰泥已脆裂老化,全剥落下来了。
他们的车胎在慢慢老化。

entry.tran: （表示认为建议不可能、荒谬）想都别想，死了心吧，没门儿
entry.def: If someone says perish the thought, they mean that they think that a suggestion or possibility is unpleasant or ridiculous.

example.ex: Me a policeman! Perish the thought!...
example.tran: 我当警察！想都别想了，不可能！

example.ex: We don't have a computer (perish the thought) and have only recently bought an electric typewriter.
example.tran: 我们没有电脑（死了心吧），只好最近买了台电动打字机。

means.word_mean: 1. pass from physical life and lose all all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life;

auth_sentence.content: They can perish if they don't find shelter.
auth_sentence.res_content: They can perish if they don't find shelter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They can perish if they don't find shelter.

auth_sentence.content: Nearly all fry perish before growing beyond about...5 in.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nearly all fry perish before growing beyond about...5 in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nearly all fry perish before growing beyond about...5 in.

auth_sentence.content: These lineages survive and reproduce as their weaker relatives perish.
auth_sentence.res_content: These lineages survive and reproduce as their weaker relatives perish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These lineages survive and reproduce as their weaker relatives perish.

Sentence.sentence: More than paradise lost, a perishing rain forest could trigger a domino effect - sending winds and rains kilometers off course and loading the skies with even greater levels of greenhouse gases - that will be felt far beyond the Amazon basin.
The domino effect triggered by the perishing rain forests

means.word_mean: 丧生; 消亡; 死亡

sentences.en: Hundreds of sheep perished that year because of drought.
sentences.cn: 那年由于干旱, 几百头羊突然死去。

sentences.en: Continuous washing has perished the rubber.
sentences.cn: 不断地洗涤使橡皮筋失去弹性。

jushi.chinese: 当霜冻来临时,花都凋落了。
这条胶皮带已经老化了。

jushi.english: Hundreds of sheep perished that year because of drought.
jushi.chinese: 那年由于干旱,几百头羊突然死去。
